diwayina pura pihiti samupakara samithi 306 ka supiri welendasal pihituwime wyapruthiya yatathe jaala wiwidha sewa samupakara samithiya magin laksha 50 ta adhika mudalak wayakara ragama dambauwa pa්radeshaye supari welenda salak wiwruthakara atha.filiks perera amathyawaraya supiri welendasala wiwrutha kala awasthawaemagin pa්radeshaye pawul 1500 ta pamana itha sahana mila gananwalata bhanda miladi ganimata hakibawa wiwrutha kirime uthsawayata sahabhagiwemin amathya filiks perera mahatha pawasiya.ee samagama supiri welandasal sankirnayehi sthapithakarana lada ga්ramiya bankuwa magin ganudenukaruwan sandaha naya pahasukam , ithurum sahathika bhanda ukaskirime pahasukam ,swayan rakiya naya labaganime pahasukamda salasa athi athara naya labaganna ganudenukaruwanta rakshana aawaranayakda himiwanu atha.naya himiya yam heyakin miya giyada ema naya piyawimata rakshana aawaranaya upayogikaraganimata salasumkara athi bawa amathyawaraya kiya.-

shri lankawe pawathwena eksath jathinge 14 wana wesak dina ulela mayi masa 12,13,14 yana dinawala kolambaa ha mahanuwara di pawathwena athara, mehi pradhana aaradhithaya washayen indiya agramathya naredra modi mahatha sahabhagiwana athara, me sandaha sahabhagi wimata niyamitha kambojaya, wiyatnamaya, nepalaya, laoosaya saha miyanmar yana ratawala rajya nayakayinta aaradhana kirima sandaha janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahathage wishesha paniwidayak ragena adhikarana ha buddhashasana amathya aacharya wijayadasa rajapaksha mahatha me dinawala mema ratawala sancharayaka yedi sitina bawa adhikarana ha buddhashasana amathyanshaya pawasayi.
